content.heading: <time> Tag
paragraphs: The <time> tag defines a specific time or datetime.

Example:

Open from 10:00 to 21:00 every weekday.

I have a date on Valentines day.

content.heading: Definition and Usage
paragraphs: The datetime attribute provides a machine-readable format.
Enables calendar reminders and smarter search results.

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 62, Edge 18, Firefox 22, Safari 7, Opera 49.
